title: Helen Hunt spotted for the first time since being hospitalized following terrifying collision
text:
She was involved in a scary car collision earlier this week which resulted in a short hospital stay.

And Helen Hunt seemed to be in great spirits as she stepped out for a cup of coffee with a friend in Los Angeles on Friday morning.

The 56-year-old actress dressed down in sweatpants and a T-shirt just a few days after she was taken to Cedars-Sinai Medical Center when her chauffeur-driven SUV was T-boned, causing the vehicle to turn on its side.

Looking good: Helen Hunt seemed to be in great spirits as she stepped out for a cup of coffee with a friend in Los Angeles on Friday morning

Helen bundled up in a dark green camouflaged hoodie which was unzipped to reveal a grey T-shirt.

She wore matching sweatpants and made her way through the parking lot wearing black trainers with thick white soles.

The Twister star wore her bright blonde hair straight to her shoulders and kept a pair of over-sized shades on her eyes.

Healthy: The 56-year-old actress dressed down in sweatpants and a T-shirt just a few days after she was taken to Cedars-Sinai Medical Center when her chauffeur-driven SUV was T-boned, causing the vehicle to turn on its side

She was joined by a red-headed friend while on the coffee run as the pair carried their cups to go.

DailyMail.com obtained video of the scary crash where the car she was riding in — a chauffeured black Cadillac Escalade — was plowed into by a white sedan and flipped onto its side.

At the scene of the accident, she said she was suffering pain, but she was luckily in stable condition when brought to the hospital.

Scary situation: DailyMail.com obtained video of the scary crash where the car she was riding in — a chauffeured black Cadillac Escalade — was plowed into by a white sedan and flipped onto its side

There weren't any reports of substance use and no citations have been issued, TMZ's sources revealed.

Helen became a star on the small screen in the '90s sitcom Mad About You — for which she has lately been filming a reboot.

The revived version of the show, which originally ran on NBC from 1992-99, reunites Hunt with her old co-star Paul Reiser and premieres on Nov. 20.

Six episodes of the 12-episode season will be released on Spectrum originals that day, with the remainder to drop Dec. 18.
